EmailTemplate.name: Trademark Search
EmailTemplate.subject: Your LegalZoom Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in conducting a Trademark Search for your business name, product name, logo, and/or slogan. We simplify the process for you by searching multiple databases and compiling a comprehensive summary of the search results, and providing these results to you in electronic and/or written form.
For your reference, general information regarding Trademark Searches has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact an Intellectual Property Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist, we will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
A comprehensive Trademark Search will provide you with details on businesses and/or products that are currently using the same or similar name, slogan, and/or logo to your business or product. The search results will provide information about the current usage of these items to help you determine if your current business or product name is available to pursue Trademark registration.
For your convenience, we have listed all relevant pricing below.
TRADEMARK SEARCH Federal & State - $199.00 Federal, State, and Common Law - $299.00 WorldScan International Search - $499.00
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/trademark-search/trademark-search-overview.html Package details http://www.legalzoom.com/trademark-search/trademark-search-pricing.html
ADDITIONAL SERVICES Logo Search - $250.00
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} (800) 773-0888 x{!User.Extension} www.legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
